item.title: About
item.description:
Background

I hold a dual engineering degree from Arts et Métiers ParisTech (mechanical, industrial & energy engineering) and a MSc from UC Berkeley (Systems Engineering & Data Science, Civil & Environmental Engineering department).

After graduating, I joined the 1er RPIMa — France’s premier special forces regiment — as a paratrooper. This experience sharpened my ability to operate under pressure, make fast decisions with incomplete information, and stay focused on outcomes in high-stakes environments.

item.title: Turbofan Engine RUL Prediction
item.description: End-to-end predictive maintenance system for aircraft turbofan engines. RUL prediction on NASA CMAPSS dataset — RMSE 17.34 · R² 0.806 on official NASA benchmark.
